questions.text: The company's decision to outsource production was a highly _______ one.
Please submit your reimbursement forms to the accounting department _______ the end of the month.
The recent market research data suggests that consumer spending is _______ steadily.
The CEO will review the budget proposals _______ the final approval is granted.
All factory workers must wear protective gear _______ required safety regulations.
The seminar was primarily attended by young entrepreneurs and _______ from technology firms.
The deadline for submission has been _______ by one week due to unforeseen delays.
Customers who purchase items online are asked to provide a valid e-mail address _______ their order confirmation.
The new security policy is intended to prevent unauthorized _______ to the confidential database.
The construction of the new headquarters is expected to be _______ completed by next March.
The training session will focus on improving time management and effective _______ skills.
The quality of the final product improved dramatically _______ the company upgraded its machinery.
The company's profits exceeded all _______ expectations last quarter.
Mr. Lee is quite familiar _______ the process of filing patent applications.
All outgoing invoices must be checked by the supervisor _______ they are sent to clients.
The project manager emphasized the _______ of meeting the tight production schedule.
Please contact us at your earliest _______ to reschedule your appointment.
The restaurant is popular _______ its fresh seafood and unique atmosphere.
The maintenance staff is responsible for ensuring that all office equipment is working _______.
The annual report indicates that sales figures have risen _______ over the last fiscal year.
Due to a technical failure, the website experienced a major network _______ this morning.
Dr. Kim's lecture will deal _______ the latest developments in solar energy technology.
The manufacturing plant is fully _______ with state-of-the-art robotic assembly lines.
Applicants must demonstrate a strong commitment _______ customer satisfaction.
The company is facing intense _______ from competitors in the Asian market.
The research team was able to draw important conclusions _______ the gathered data.
The customer service representative spoke slowly and _______ to ensure clarity.
All employees are required to _______ the company's internal confidentiality agreement.
The newly installed machinery will operate more _______ than the older models.
Mr. Chen was highly _______ of the team's performance during the busy holiday season.
